name: Block Puzzle - Balls Game
description:
Unique rescue endless rotation brain games fun and try out the most challenging 2020 block puzzle fun game now. Filled with thousands of challenging levels featuring multiple styles of path, vortex and hold designs, this app is all about finding an exit way through the maze of madness.

The new vortex game has a highly interactive game play. All you need to do is touch the compass and adjust its direction to make the balls move in the tube and find an exit. Once all the balls have passed through the exit, the level is cleared and you can move on to a better, more challenging level.

How to play Block Puzzle - Balls Game:
- Pick a level and control the compass
- Touch the maze and tilt it to slide the balls
- Rotate the maze to move balls into the tube.

Features of Block Puzzle - Balls Game:
- Simple and easy UI/UX
- Smooth game play with responsive controls
- Highly challenging maze levels and puzzle designs
- 3D ball rotating fun in over thousand different game play levels
- Increase your score with every right move you play
- One-touch simple controls and addictive gameplay!
Would you like to experience the delight of the interactive 3D ball rotation fun game? Download the new Block Puzzle - Balls Game today!
